content.raw: That job was not using the -prerelease repository so it does not find sdformat4-dev. Although we have modified the default CI jobs, there are still some jobs floating around which have some duplicate code (like gazebo-any-sdformat-any). I think that with the migration to Docker+DSL remove most of the duplicate code, but gazebo is still to be migrated.
content.html: That job was not using the -prerelease repository so it does not find sdformat4-dev. Although we have modified the default CI jobs, there are still some jobs floating around which have some duplicate code (like gazebo-any-sdformat-any). I think that with the migration to Docker+DSL remove most of the duplicate code, but gazebo is still to be migrated.
